code: import React,{useState}from'react';import{createPost}from'../api';import{jsx as _jsx,jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";const PostForm=()=>{const[name,setName]=useState('');const[story,setStory]=useState('');const handleSubmit=async e=>{e.preventDefault();try{await createPost({name,story});setName('');setStory('');}catch(error){console.error('Error adding post:',error);}};return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h2",{children:"Create a New Post"}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("form",{onSubmit:handleSubmit,children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("input",{type:"text",placeholder:"Name (optional)",value:name,onChange:e=>setName(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("textarea",{placeholder:"Story",value:story,onChange:e=>setStory(e.target.value)}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("button",{type:"submit",children:"Submit"})]})]});};export default PostForm;
